title: OASL activates MAPK to drive psoriatic pathogenesis: Astilbin targeting this axis improves metabolic-inflammation crosstalk.
abstract: This study aimed to elucidate the role of oligoadenylate synthase-like protein (OASL) as a pivotal regulator integrating keratinocyte hyperproliferation, inflammation, and lipid metabolic dysregulation in psoriasis pathogenesis.
